verses.verse: ( The LORD Is My Strength) לְדָוִ֡ד <WH1732> lə·ḏā·wiḏ Of David. אֵ֘לֶ֤יךָ <WH413> ’ê·le·ḵā To You, יְהוָ֨ה׀ <WH3068> Yah·weh O LORD, אֶקְרָ֗א <WH7121> ’eq·rā I call; צוּרִי֮ <WH6697> ṣū·rî O my Rock. אַֽל־ <WH408> ’al- be not תֶּחֱרַ֪שׁ <WH2790> te·ḥĕ·raš deaf מִ֫מֶּ֥נִּי <WH4480> mim·men·nî to me, פֶּן־ <WH6435> pen- For if תֶּֽחֱשֶׁ֥ה <WH2814> te·ḥĕ·šeh You remain silent מִמֶּ֑נִּי <WH4480> mim·men·nî ..., וְ֝נִמְשַׁ֗לְתִּי <WH4911> wə·nim·šal·tî I will be עִם־ <WH5973> ‘im- like י֥וֹרְדֵי <WH3381> yō·wr·ḏê those descending בֽוֹר׃ <WH953> ḇō·wr to the Pit.

שְׁמַ֤ע <WH8085> šə·ma‘ Hear ק֣וֹל <WH6963> qō·wl my cry תַּ֭חֲנוּנַי <WH8469> ta·ḥă·nū·nay for mercy בְּשַׁוְּעִ֣י <WH7768> bə·šaw·wə·‘î when I call אֵלֶ֑יךָ <WH413> ’ê·le·ḵā to You  for help , בְּנָשְׂאִ֥י <WH5375> bə·nā·śə·’î when I lift up יָ֝דַ֗י <WH3027> yā·ḏay my hands אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- toward דְּבִ֥יר <WH1687> də·ḇîr sanctuary. ( Or Your innermost sanctuary or Your Most Holy Place) קָדְשֶֽׁךָ׃ <WH6944> qāḏ·še·ḵā Your holy

אַל־ <WH408> ’al- Do not תִּמְשְׁכֵ֣נִי <WH4900> tim·šə·ḵê·nî drag me away עִם־ <WH5973> ‘im- with רְשָׁעִים֮ <WH7563> rə·šā·‘îm the wicked, וְעִם־ <WH5973> wə·‘im- and with פֹּ֪עֲלֵ֫י <WH6466> pō·‘ă·lê the workers אָ֥וֶן <WH205> ’ā·wen of iniquity, דֹּבְרֵ֣י <WH1696> dō·ḇə·rê who speak שָׁ֭לוֹם <WH7965> lō·wm peace עִם־ <WH5973> ‘im- to רֵֽעֵיהֶ֑ם <WH7453> rê·‘ê·hem their neighbors וְ֝רָעָ֗ה <WH7451> wə·rā·‘āh while malice בִּלְבָבָֽם׃ <WH3824> bil·ḇā·ḇām is in their hearts.

תֶּן־ <WH5414> ten- Repay לָהֶ֣ם Prep-l│Pro-3mp ( lā·hem) them כְּפָעֳלָם֮ 6467 Prep-k│N-msc│3mp ( kə·p̄ā·‘o·lām) according to their deeds וּכְרֹ֪עַ 7455 Conj-w, Prep-k│N-msc ( ū·ḵə·rō·a‘) of evil. מַֽעַלְלֵ֫יהֶ֥ם 4611 N-mpc│3mp ( ma·‘al·lê·hem) and for their works כְּמַעֲשֵׂ֣ה 4639 Prep-k│N-msc ( kə·ma·‘ă·śêh) have done; יְ֭דֵיהֶם 3027 N-fdc│3mp ( yə·ḏê·hem) for what their hands תֵּ֣ן 5414 V-Qal-Imp-ms ( tên) Repay לָהֶ֑ם Prep-l│Pro-3mp ( lā·hem) them הָשֵׁ֖ב 7725 V-Hifil-Imp-ms ( hā·šêḇ) bring back גְּמוּלָ֣ם 1576 N-msc│3mp ( gə·mū·lām) what they deserve. לָהֶֽם׃ Prep-l│Pro-3mp ( lā·hem) on them

כִּ֤י <WH3588> kî Since לֹ֤א <WH3808> lō they show no יָבִ֡ינוּ <WH995> yā·ḇî·nū regard אֶל־ <WH413> ’el- ... פְּעֻלֹּ֣ת <WH6468> pə·‘ul·lōṯ for the works יְ֭הוָה <WH3068> Yah·weh of the LORD וְאֶל־ <WH413> wə·’el- or מַעֲשֵׂ֣ה <WH4639> ma·‘ă·śêh have done, יָדָ֑יו <WH3027> yā·ḏāw what His hands יֶ֝הֶרְסֵ֗ם <WH2040> ye·her·sêm He will tear them down וְלֹ֣א <WH3808> wə·lō and never יִבְנֵֽם׃ <WH1129> yiḇ·nêm rebuild them.

בָּר֥וּךְ <WH1288> bā·rūḵ Blessed be יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> Yah·weh the LORD, כִּי־ <WH3588> kî·šā- for שָׁ֝מַע <WH8085> ma‘ He has heard ק֣וֹל <WH6963> qō·wl my cry תַּחֲנוּנָֽי׃ <WH8469> ta·ḥă·nū·nāy for mercy.

יְהוָ֤ה׀ <WH3068> Yah·weh The LORD עֻזִּ֥י <WH5797> ‘uz·zî is my strength וּמָגִנִּי֮ <WH4043> ū·mā·ḡin·nî and my shield בּ֤וֹ Prep│3ms ( bōw) ; בָטַ֥ח 982 V-Qal-Perf-3ms ( ḇā·ṭaḥ) trusts in Him, לִבִּ֗י 3820 N-msc│1cs ( lib·bî) my heart וְֽנֶ֫עֱזָ֥רְתִּי 5826 Conj-w│V-Nifal-ConjPerf-1cs ( wə·ne·‘ĕ·zā·rə·tî) and I am helped. וַיַּעֲלֹ֥ז 5937 Conj-w│V-Qal-ConsecImperf-3ms ( way·ya·‘ă·lōz) rejoices, לִבִּ֑י 3820 N-msc│1cs ( lib·bî) Therefore my heart וּֽמִשִּׁירִ֥י 7892 Conj-w, Prep-m│N-msc│1cs ( ū·miš·šî·rî) with my song. אֲהוֹדֶֽנּוּ׃ 3034 V-Hifil-Imperf-1cs│3mse ( ’ă·hō·w·ḏen·nū) and I give thanks to Him

יְהוָ֥ה <WH3068> Yah·weh The LORD עֹֽז־ <WH5797> ‘ōz- is the strength of His people לָ֑מוֹ Prep│3mp ( lā·mōw) , וּמָ֘ע֤וֹז 4581 Conj-w│N-msc ( ū·mā·‘ō·wz) a stronghold יְשׁוּע֖וֹת 3444 N-fpc ( yə·šū·‘ō·wṯ) of salvation מְשִׁיח֣וֹ 4899 Adj-msc│3ms ( mə·šî·ḥōw) for His anointed הֽוּא׃ 1931 Pro-3ms ( hū) .

הוֹשִׁ֤יעָה׀ <WH3467> hō·wō·šî·‘āh Save אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - עַמֶּ֗ךָ <WH5971> ‘am·me·ḵā Your people וּבָרֵ֥ךְ <WH1288> ū·ḇā·rêḵ and bless אֶת־ <WH853> ’eṯ- - נַחֲלָתֶ֑ךָ <WH5159> na·ḥă·lā·ṯe·ḵā Your inheritance; וּֽרְעֵ֥ם <WH7462> ū·rə·‘êm shepherd them וְ֝נַשְּׂאֵ֗ם <WH5375> wə·naś·śə·’êm and carry עַד־ <WH5704> ‘aḏ- them הָעוֹלָֽם׃ <WH5769> hā·‘ō·w·lām forever.
